emerging_technologies.name: Autonomous Urban Transport Network
emerging_technologies.description: A city-wide system of interconnected, AI-driven autonomous vehicles and infrastructure for seamless urban mobility.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces traffic congestion, lowers pollution, increases safety, but raises privacy concerns due to extensive data collection.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Government regulations, public acceptance of autonomous vehicles, infrastructure readiness.

emerging_technologies.name: Neuralink 2.0
emerging_technologies.description: Advanced brain-computer interfaces allowing for cognitive enhancement, memory storage, and basic forms of thought communication.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for significant cognitive and social inequalities, ethical debates over privacy, identity, and consent.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Ethical and regulatory approval, technological reliability, public perception of brain augmentation.

emerging_technologies.name: Blockchain-based Planetary Resource Management
emerging_technologies.description: Decentralized systems for managing resources on extraterrestrial bodies, ensuring transparency and efficiency in space mining.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for equitable resource distribution, but also introduces new forms of digital sovereignty and cyber-security risks.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Interplanetary legal frameworks, space industry growth, technological advancements in space mining.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI-Driven Software Development
mainstream_technologies.description: AI systems capable of autonomously developing, testing, and maintaining software applications.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted by tech companies, reducing human involvement in software development cycles, but also causing job displacement concerns.

mainstream_technologies.name: Sustainable Energy Storage
mainstream_technologies.description: Advanced energy storage systems that make renewable energy more viable and reliable for grid integration.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Mainstream in new energy infrastructure projects, with significant impact on reducing reliance on fossil fuels.

epoch_themes.description: Exploration of technologies that enhance human capabilities, raising ethical questions about identity, privacy, and inequality.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Debates on human rights, consent, and the implications of cognitive enhancement.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Growing interest in cognitive and physical enhancements, regulatory frameworks to manage technology.

epoch_themes.description: Integration of autonomous systems, AI, and sustainable tech to create efficient, environmentally friendly cities.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Improved quality of life, reduced environmental impact, but challenges in data privacy and urban planning.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Smart city initiatives, push for zero-emission urban zones, and integrated transport systems.
